message.content:
{"id": "2694", "title": "Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)", "description": "Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)

Press Add for the associated editors.


a. Enable multiple selection.

b. Add a width hint for the dialog.

c. Mark the default entry in the associated editors list as (default) (similar to perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. Need a width hint for the dialog.

g. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, f, g.", "OB": "The OK button is enabled even when no selection is made.", "EB": "After making no selection in the Internal Editors, go to the External Editors section and select an entry. Switch back to Internal Editors and press OK. The selected external editor will be added.", "SR": "MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to the preference page and navigate to Workbench > File Editors.
2. Without selecting something from the 'Internal Editors' section, go to 'External Editors' and select an entry.
3. Switch back to the 'Internal Editors' section. There is still no selection.
4. Press OK.

Expected result: This should add the selected external editor even if there was no selection made in the 'Internal Editors' section."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pagesdo the same?I currently have fixes for a, c, fNeed to releaseKLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)released fixes for a, c, f, g ', 'OB': 'No selection but OK is enabledb. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': "MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)1. in the preference page go to WorkbenchFile Editors2. Without selecting something from the 'Internal Editors' go to 'External Editors' and select an entry.Switch back to Internal: (Still no selection), press OK This adds you the selected external editor.
